name: Phylactery
description: An amulet overflowing with powerful magics.

abilities.name: Empower Spell
abilities.description: The next unit targeted ability the wielder casts deals additional magical damage in a separate instance, and debuffs the target, slowing their movement speed.
notes: Affects most offensive unit-targeted ability casts, except Item abilities, Death Pact, Holy Persuasion, Ion Shell, Enchant, Devour, and Reflected abilities
If the ability's target turns invulnerable, or if Spell Block triggers, Empower Spell will not trigger
The order of damage and debuff application depends on the target health when receiving target spell
If the target's health is above 150, Empower Spell's effects get applied before the triggering ability's effects
If the target's health below or equal to 150, the triggering ability's effects get before Empower Spell's effects
Shares cooldowns with Khanda. If both items are present, the older one takes priority
Only the oldest source within the inventory applies its debuffs. If applied by different players, the debuffs fully stack

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
84 mana, 0.35 mana regeneration and 0.7% flat base magic resistance
7 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes
9.45 main attack damage to universal heroes
